publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2796 Fergus Ewing: Damages (Asbestos-related Conditions) (Scotland) Bill (SP Bill 12)—That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Damages (Asbestos-related Conditions) (Scotland) Bill. Supported by: Kenny MacAskill*

S3M-2796 Fergus Ewing: Damages (Asbestos-related Conditions) (Scotland) Bill (SP Bill 12)—That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Damages (Asbestos-related Conditions) (Scotland) Bill. Supported by: Kenny MacAskill
